Government
==========

Austin City Council
-------------------

[![](https://www.austintexas.gov/sites/default/files/2025-09/info.svg)
Apply to become a Board or Commission member](https://www.austintexas.gov/services/apply-become-board-or-commission-member)
[![](https://www.austintexas.gov/sites/default/files/2025-09/city-council.svg)
Get information on City Council meetings](https://www.austintexas.gov/department/city-council/council-meetings)
[![](https://www.austintexas.gov/sites/default/files/2020-02/message%20boards.svg)
View the City Council message board](https://austincouncilforum.org/)
[![](https://www.austintexas.gov/sites/default/files/2020-02/email%20council%20members.svg)
Email all Austin City Council members](https://www.austintexas.gov/email/all-council-members)
[![](https://www.austintexas.gov/sites/default/files/2022-06/location_pin_2.svg)
View the City Council district map](https://maps.austintexas.gov/GIS/CouncilDistrictMap/)
[All Services](https://www.austintexas.gov/services)
